pullrequest.title: Change local job resubmission to append stderr logs

content.raw:
Can you verify these tests still pass on SGE in non-local mode? You may need to make the error lines optional regexes for it to work there.

Why is exit status changed from 75 to 1?

Otherwise, approved in principle.
